properties.Name: RecipeRelatedParty
properties.Description: A party that has a relationship with the recipe process over the indicated period.

Columns.Name: RecipeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a recipe.

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: RecipePartyRelationshipTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a contract relationship type.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated recipe - party relationship is valid or in-effect.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated recipe - party relationship is valid or in-effect.

Columns.Name: RecipeRelationshipNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the recipe - party relationship.
